functions.name: Get GitPOAP holders given an GitPOAPEventID
functions.description: Returns all Ethereum Addresses which have received a GitPoap with a given eventId

args.name: gitPoapEventId
args.description: Event id of the GitPOAP token

functions.name: Get GitPOAPEventIds given an Ethereum Address or ENS name
functions.description: Returns all the Event Ids of all POAPs owned by an Ethereum Address or ENS name

args.name: ethereum wallet address
args.description: Ethereum wallet address of the holders of the GitPOAP tokens
